price: 6. Habeenka saacadahiisa (oo la tukado) baa leh khushuuc badan aadna u toosan odhaah ahaan4.
arabic: إِنَّ نَاشِئَةَ ٱلَّيۡلِ هِيَ أَشَدُّ وَطۡـٔٗا وَأَقۡوَمُ قِيلًا
footnotes: 4. Tafsiir kale oo aqbal ah ee isla ereyadaa waa: Hubaal kicitaanka habeenka baa sii adag.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: inna nāshi-ata al-layli hiya ashaddu waṭan wa-aqwamu qīlan
